browserPort.label: Browser Control Port
browserPort.help: Port for browser CDP control API (default: 18791)

browserUseApiKey.label: Browser Use API Key
browserUseApiKey.help: API key for stealth cloud browsers (browser-use.com). Enables unbrowse_stealth tool.

autoDiscover.label: Auto-Discover Skills
autoDiscover.help: Automatically generate skills when the agent browses APIs (default: true)

creatorWallet.label: Creator Wallet (EVM)
creatorWallet.help: Your 0x wallet address for receiving USDC when others download your skills

skillIndexEvmPrivateKey.label: Payment Private Key
skillIndexEvmPrivateKey.help: EVM private key for paying x402 USDC when downloading skills from the index
